column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Toph says : " Okay , if you want me to bend out this metal , you need to relax . "
#Text=Korra says : " I am relaxed . "
#Text=Toph says : " Seriously ?
#Text=I 'm ready .
#Text=" Toph says : " It would n't hurt if you would just relax !
#Text=Stop fighting me !
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm not fighting !
#Text=" Toph says : " All right , that 's it .
#Text=You 're going to have to do this yourself .
#Text=Clearly , you want to keep the metal in there .
#Text=" Korra says : " What do you mean ?
#Text=Why would I want poison inside me ?
#Text=" Toph says : " I do n't know !
#Text=Maybe so you have an excuse not to go back to being the Avatar .
#Text=If you do n't get better , you ca n't do your job , so you do n't have to worry about getting hurt again !
#Text=" Korra says : " Wha That 's ridiculous !
#Text=" Toph says : " Whatever .
#Text=When you want it out , you can bend it out .
#Text=I ca n't deal with all your issues for you .
#Text=" Korra says : " Wait !
#Text=What am I supposed to do now ?
#Text=" Toph says : " How should I know ?
#Text=Ask the spirit that brought you here .
#Text=The good news is , if you 're looking for a place to hang where no one will bother you , you picked the best swamp in the world !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " This ... is a mission of the utmost importance .
#Text=Conflict is coming to the Earth Kingdom and we need to find the Avatar .
#Text=Can I count on you three to bring Korra home ?
#Text=" Meelo says : " You can count on one of us .
#Text=I do n't know about these two ladies .
#Text="
